# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Use this section to tell people about which versions of your project are
currently being supported with security updates.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of our systems seriously.

If you have discovered a security vulnerability in this project, please report it privately. **Do not disclose it as a public issue.**

Please email us at security@aleatoric.systems.

We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and provide an estimated timeline for a fix.
